snippet.title: Lost in the Void - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Immerse yourself in the captivating world of Lost in the Void, an enchanting isometric pixel art adventure that seamlessly blends RPG elements. Inspired by the 80s this upcoming game immerses you in the world of a high school senior, facing a crucial decision. 

Forge bonds with your companions and shape your character through skill distribution. Get ready for a narrative-driven experience that unleashes your imagination. Experience the magic of your childhood dreams in this exclusive title. 

Demo release scheduled for Q3 2023!

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2105610/Lost_in_the_Void/

Follow us for updates:
https://linktr.ee/lostinthevoid

Developed by Nightcall Studio.
